info.name: Weekplan Dark
info.description: A simple dark reskin of Weekplan.
info.additionalInfo:
Note: This style is still in development, but right now I feel like it's fleshed out enough for a early release here.

Changelog:  
01-30-18 - Initial release  
01-31-18 - I. Week selector recolored, II. Fixed current day's color, III. Started on the edit task window, IV. Started Analytics page, V. Started Vision Tracker page. --
02-21-18 - I. Fix time container being white, II. Fix background color on edit task
02-26-18 - I. Change up time bar position
